actions.description: The giant makes two greatclub attacks. Greatclub. Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.name: Rock

traits.description: The giant has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.
traits.name: Stone Camouflage
